text.div:
HSPC Blood Pressure Measurement Method/Device Value Set

A set of codes that describe the method or device used to measure a systolic blood pressure.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-bpmeasmethoddevice

name: HSPC Blood Pressure Measurement Method/Device Value Set
description: A set of codes that describe the method or device used to measure a systolic blood pressure.
